mapper.select: select cal_id as _id, cal_title as title, cal_description as description, cal_start as start, cal_end as end, cal_type as type, cal_background_color as backgroundColor, cal_text_color as textColor, cal_all_day as allDay, user_name as username from calendar
mapper.insert: insert into calendar(cal_title, cal_description, cal_start, cal_end, cal_type, cal_background_color, cal_text_color, cal_all_day, user_name ) values(#{title}, #{description}, #{start}, #{end}, #{type},#{backgroundColor}, #{textColor}, #{allDay}, #{username});
